description: This file contains unit tests for the TicTacToe iOS app, specifically testing the GameViewModel's reset functionality and cell state after taps.

classes.name: TicTacToeIOSTests
classes.description: Unit test case class for testing the TicTacToe iOS application's view model.

methods.name: testResetClearsBoard
methods.description: Test that resetting the game clears the game board.
